:::{#person-profile}

Rebecca is an undergraduate currently studying biological sciences and working on her final year project, which investigates genomic erosion metrics in butterflies. Her main interests are genetics, genomics, statistics, data analysis and conservation. Rebecca was selected for and attended the Gatsby Plant Science Summer School in 2023. During July 2024, Rebecca is on work experience at a startup biotechnology company called Sun Bear Biofuture that aims to produce a commercially viable alternative to palm oil.

:::
